Azure Updates
Azure Updates

Official release of Azure Monitor
  • Building a website
  • Live streaming and VOD
  • SQL Database Backup
  • Cognitive Services
  • Remote development testing
  • Smart Cloud Conferencing
  • WeChat Marketing

1 RMB Trial: Solutions for building a website

Focusing on different types of websites and needs, rapidly build a website with MySQL Database or SQL Database

More

1 RMB Trial: International competition level live streaming and VOD solutions

Easy to use video coding, smooth streaming, highly expandable design framework, and ability to convey media content with any type of equipment

More

1 RMB Trial: SQL Database Backup solutions

Operation free, low cost with high availability and secure configuration, SQL Database automatically backs up to Azure storage ,recovered anytime based on business needs

More

1 RMB Trial: “Cognitive Services” Face API and WeChat app development solutions

Combined with wechat app,“Cognitive Services” Face API provided by the 1 RMB Trail account rapidly achieve facial recognition app development and testing.

More

1 RMB Trial: Automatic service with remote development testing environment management solutions

Azure automatic services with virtual machine services provided by the 1 RMB Trial account rapidly achieve the construction and life-cycle management of a remote development and testing environment.

More

1 RMB Trial: Smart cloud conferencing solution based on a WeChat Public Accounts

Azure resources provided by the 1 RMB Trial account, based on Cognitive Services with a WeChat Public Accounts, uses mobile terminals, advanced face API, Azure cloud storage and apps to create a new smart cloud conferencing management platform.

More

1 RMB Trial: Self-service WeChat marketing solutions

Combined with WeChat application development,Azure resources (App Service, Databases, Cognitive Services, etc.) provided by the 1 RMB Trial account rapidly achieve the building of self-service WeChat marketing tools.

More

Azure Webinars

lasting, stable security that can be rapidly expanded
Free

With limitless scaling of apps and API

MySQL
Database on Azure

Effortlessly extend your local network through site-to-site VPNs
Free

Free

Free

Batch (Preview)

Run large-scale
batch processing computing jobs
Free

Service Fabric

anonymous app platforms
Free

Notification Hubs

Can rapidly send large amounts of information over multiple platforms

SQL Database

Using a SQL Database as an example, can create and arrange synching of data
Starting from RMB1.04 /day

Free

Event Hubs

From websites to apps to equipment selection cloud scaling is needed
To support telemetry data, each second can contain several million events

Load Balancer

Enables your applications

Free

Starting from RMB253.02 /month

cloud verification and provide access control for apps
Free

and service encryption keys and other secrets

wazcomHomepage.siteName: Azure Cloud Computing - Secure and Trustworthy Smart Cloud Services Platform
wazcomHomepage.siteDescription: Azure Cloud Service is a flexible enterprise-level cloud platform. It provides databases, cloud services, cloud storage, artificial intelligence, CDN, etc. It has efficient, stable, and extensible cloud services. The Azure cloud computing platform offers enterprises one-stop solutions, rapid identification of user requirements, and knowledge about how to fit into an enterprise’s varied solutions and related services.
wazcomHomepage.metaKeywords: Azure Cloud Computing, Azure Cloud Platform, Smart Cloud
